content: hello cryptoethusiastsüëãits time for my 16th auctionoffered in this auction are 4 Polymerbit notes (BTC22 samples) with the new security feature (clear window/stripe)these 4 notes are numbered as follows:6 V1.3 - 7 V1.3 - 8 V1.3 - 9 V1.3these 4 notes were shown, presented and explained by me at the BTC22 conference in innsbruck among some bitcoinersthe winner of this auction will win all 4 notesAuction Terms:Bid Format:¬† Bids only in BTCStarting Bid: lot 1: 0.001BTC¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Bid Incremeents:¬† 0.0005BTCSnipe:¬† each bid for each lot in the final 10 minutes adds 10 minutes until no bid has been made for 10 minutesAuction Ends:¬† Saturday, 24 September 2022 @ 23:59 CESTPayment address will be supplied to the winner via PM.‚úâFREESHIPPING WORLDWIDE‚úâ

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: willing to buy one of the 4 from whoever wins this auction - I need only 1

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: I‚Äôm here to verify Cygans claims. Polymerbit produced sixteen of these samples. Six of which were subsequently destroyed. Four samples were sent to Cygan to showcase in Innsbruck. They are now being auctioned by him with my permission. They are were made to unveil our newest in-house clear window technology. Currently at about 0.0051 BTC each to make, they still too expensive to create normal Polymerbit runs with. We are working on bringing the cost down over time. V 1.3 stands for the version of the technology. Biggest improvements are material feel, details possible, and accuracy of the print. For context, mystery 2 (the monero note) was 0.1.
